|chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |nqam = |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = Yes |addchip = |flags = MU-MIMO, Bluetooth 4.2 (BLE), |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 09/14/2018 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===Product Key Features=== *[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA6174A-5 (''Rome'') *2x spatial streams (2SS) MU-MIMO *M.2 2230, Key A+E form factor *WLAN host interface: Mini PCIe 2.1 *Bluetooth host interface: USB 1.1 *2.4GHz max 18dBm output power (per chain) *5GHz max 10.5dBm output power (per chain) *802.11ac compliant & backward compatible with 802.11a/b/g/n *Supports Bluetooth 4.2 + HS, BLE, and ANT+ and :backward compatibility with BT 1.2 and BT 2.X ===Ordering Configuration=== 
Item Code            Code Chipset   Card FF   Information
WLT674 7A0000 1.00   QCA6174A-5    M.2       2x2 2.4GHz/5GHz WiFi + Bluetooth
==Links of Interest== [https://www.compex.com.sg/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/WLT674-v1.5-WH-186.pdf Datasheet] ===Purchase Sample=== *[http://shop.compex.com.sg/wireless-modules/mu-mimo/wlt674.html Compex System Sample Store] ==Pictures==
